text: Madonna of Avenue A is a 1929 American drama movie directed by Michael Curtiz and starring Dolores Costello, Grant Withers, Douglas Gerrard, Louise Dresser, Otto Hoffman, Lee Moran. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * Category:1929 drama movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Madonna of Avenue A
